update t_tfs_commonpaymethod
deskid = #{deskid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paytype = #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bankname =#{bankname},
bankmark = #{bankmark,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime},
where commonpaymethodid = #{commonpaymethodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select com.commonpaymethodid, com.deskid, com.paytype, com.bankmark, com.bankname, com.count, com.creator, com.createtime from t_tfs_commonpaymethod com LEFT JOIN t_tfs_cashierdesk cash on cash.deskid=com.deskid where cash.usedfor=#{usedFor} and cash.userid=#{userId}
